files.patch:
@@ -173,0 +173,8 @@ + *

+ * All {@code URL} constructors may additionally throw + * {@link MalformedURLException} if the underlying {@link URLStreamHandler} + * implementation rejects, or is known to reject, any of the parameters. + * In particular, if {@link URLStreamHandler#parseURL(URL, String, int, int) + * URLStreamHandler.parseURL} is called and throws {@code IllegalArgumentException}. + * However, which checks are performed is implementation dependent, and + * callers should not rely on such checks for full URL validation. @@ -355,1 +363,3 @@ - * is a negative number other than -1 + * is a negative number other than -1, or if the + * underlying protocol implementation rejects the + * {@code URL} @@ -383,1 +393,3 @@ - * @throws MalformedURLException if an unknown protocol is specified. + * @throws MalformedURLException if an unknown protocol is specified, + * or if the underlying protocol implementation + * rejects the {@code URL} @@ -418,1 +430,3 @@ - * is a negative number other than -1 + * is a negative number other than -1, or if the + * underlying protocol implementation rejects the + * {@code URL}

@@ -132,0 +132,2 @@
+     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the implementation of the protocol
+     *                    handler rejects any of the given parameters
@@ -500,0 +502,2 @@
+     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the implementation of the protocol
+     *                    handler rejects any of the given parameters
